title: Jewish New Yorkers Arm Up
body: New York's Jewish community is arming up ahead of Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani's inauguration, fearing a weakened police presence and rise in antisemitic incidents.

title: Yerushalayim Violence Erupts
body: Shas MK Yoav Ben Tzur's vehicle attacked by extremist youths in Yerushalayim over draft law debate. Rioters smashed car windows before police arrived. Ben Tzur's office calls it a "lynch attempt".
